description: Led the strategic integration of emerging technologies (Space Tech, Metaverse, Decentralized Finance, NFT, Generative AI) into the company's roadmap while aligning with TCS's focus on societal well-being, demonstrating innovation and strategic planning leadership.

Managed and directed data-driven decision-making by leveraging data analytics and software engineering expertise, optimizing data pipelines, and effectively collaborating cross-functionally to lead teams toward strategic outcomes.

Championed continuous learning and tech mastery within the organisation by promoting proficiency in diverse programming languages and frameworks, cultivating a culture of ongoing learning, and providing leadership in adapting to industry trends.
Leveraged data-mining tools to aggregate insights, extracting valuable decision-making information from diverse sources, resulting in a 25% increase in data-driven decision accuracy.​
Evaluated data from primary and secondary sources, guaranteeing data integrity and efficient database management, while managing more than 500 GB of data with a 96% accuracy rate.
Produced strategic management reports showcasing trends, patterns, and predictive analyses, contributing to a 15% improvement in proactive decision-making across the organization.
Optimized 'Video Incident Detection System (VIDS)' module performance, realizing a 30% enhancement, leading to more effective real-time incident detection.​
Streamlined interdisciplinary collaboration, reducing integration time by 20%, and facilitating the seamless integration of sensor data for enhanced 'VIDS' precision and robustness.

Leveraged AI in directing comprehensive testing processes, ensuring a superior software product. Attained a 98% reliability rate through advanced AI-driven unit, integration testing, and user acceptance testing for each 'VIDS' module.

blog.title: User Experience Design – A little more than just design
